Address.label: Address
Address.value: 539 SOUTH MAIN STREET, FINDLAY, Ohio, 45840-3229, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Marathon Petroleum is an independent refiner with 13 refineries in the midcontinent, West Coast, and Gulf Coast of the United States with total throughput capacity of 2.9 million barrels per day. Its Dickinson, ND, facility produces 184 million gallons a year of renewable diesel. Its Martinez, CA, facility will have the ability to produce 730 million gallons a year of renwable diesel once converted.
